name: Rheumatoid Arthritis, Joint Pain or Joint Swelling Today
shortname: Patient has joint pain or joint swelling today

name: Rheumatoid Arthritis, Needs Acute Pain Management Today
shortname: Patient needs acute pain management today
description:
Pain control -- NSAIDs: paracetamol 500mg po qid, and/or ibuprofen 400mg po tid.
Acute flare w/ evidence of joint swelling or effusions -- prednisolone 10mg po daily x 7 days.
** STOP prednisone and NSAIDs when disease control is achieved.

name: Rheumatoid Arthritis, Patient on Methotrexate
description:
CONTRAINDICATIONS pregnant, breast-feeding, patients with liver disease or alcohol intake,
renal impairment, immunodeficiency syndrome
